zh.title: 郭令灿私有化马来西亚地产子公司
zh.fullTitle: 亿万富翁郭令灿旗下国浩集团拟私有化马来西亚地产开发子公司
zh.summary: 亿万富翁郭令灿旗下的国浩集团提出私有化其马来西亚地产开发子公司。此举旨在获得更大运营灵活性以精简业务。私有化通常意味着母公司希望更自主地管理资产，可能涉及重组或战略调整。该交易将影响少数股东权益及该马来西亚子公司的未来发展方向。

relations.label: 郭令灿 (Quek Leng Chan)
relations.desc: 马来西亚/新加坡亿万富翁，国浩集团主席

relations.label: 国浩集团 (Guocoland Ltd.)
relations.desc: 新加坡上市的房地产投资与开发公司

relations.label: 马来西亚地产子公司
relations.desc: 国浩集团在马来西亚的房地产开发业务单元

relations.label: 私有化
relations.desc: 企业重组行为，可能导致资产整合或战略转向

strategic: 国浩集团可能意图整合其东南亚地产业务，以应对区域市场波动并提升决策效率。
此举可能预示着母公司对马来西亚房地产市场长期前景的特定判断，或为后续资产处置或再投资做准备。

investment.thesis: 私有化有助于精简结构、释放价值，长期看可能提升集团整体运营效率和盈利能力。

zh.title: 中国服务业活动加速扩张
zh.fullTitle: 中国服务业PMI加速扩张，尽管需求仍显疲弱
zh.summary: 一项私人调查显示，中国服务业活动在连续四个月增速放缓后出现回升。这表明尽管年初经济开局不稳，但部分领域正重获增长动力。然而，需求疲软的问题依然存在，增长基础可能并不牢固。该数据为评估中国经济复苏的韧性和结构提供了关键线索。

relations.label: 中国服务业
relations.desc: 中国经济的重要组成部分，包括金融、零售、科技服务等

relations.label: PMI (采购经理指数)
relations.desc: 衡量经济活动的先行指标，高于50表示扩张

relations.label: 需求疲软
relations.desc: 当前经济面临的主要挑战，制约增长潜力

relations.label: 经济复苏
relations.desc: 中国经济在后疫情时代及结构调整期的增长路径

strategic: 服务业复苏迹象可能缓解市场对中国经济硬着陆的担忧，但需观察其可持续性及是否向其他经济部门传导。
数据表明政策支持或内生修复可能在某些服务业领域开始见效，但整体需求环境仍是关键制约。

investment.asset: 中国消费及服务类ETF (如CHIQ, KWEB)
investment.thesis: 若服务业复苏趋势确立，相关板块可能迎来估值修复，但需警惕需求侧的不确定性。

zh.title: 富士媒体股价暴跌，回购或致激进投资者退出
zh.fullTitle: 富士媒体控股宣布大规模回购，激进投资者或退出致股价暴跌
zh.summary: 日本富士媒体控股宣布大规模股票回购计划，并称与激进投资者村上世彰相关的实体可能出售其持股。此消息导致公司股价一度暴跌12%。市场将此解读为激进投资者压力的缓解，但也可能意味着推动公司变革的关键力量消失。回购计划本身将消耗公司现金，影响财务结构。

relations.label: 富士媒体控股 (Fuji Media Holdings Inc.)
relations.desc: 日本主要的媒体与广播公司

relations.label: 村上世彰 (Yoshiaki Murakami)
relations.desc: 日本知名激进投资者，曾推动多家公司改革

relations.label: 股票回购
relations.desc: 公司用现金购买自身股票，通常用于提升股价或回报股东

relations.label: 激进投资者退出
relations.desc: 可能消除公司治理的外部压力，但也带走变革催化剂

strategic: 公司可能通过回购和潜在的和解，一次性解决与激进投资者的对峙，换取管理稳定，但牺牲了部分变革动力。
此举反映了日本传统企业在面对股东积极主义时的典型应对策略——以财务手段换取控制权，而非彻底的业务改革。

investment.asset: 富士媒体控股 (Fuji Media Holdings Inc.)
investment.thesis: 激进投资者退出可能削弱公司治理改善预期，且大规模回购消耗现金，不利于长期投资，股价反弹后或面临压力。

zh.title: 爱泼斯坦关联长寿专家离开David Protein
zh.fullTitle: 与爱泼斯坦关联的长寿专家Peter Attia离开David Protein
zh.summary: 与已故金融家杰弗里·爱泼斯坦有关联的长寿医学专家彼得·阿提亚已离开David Protein公司。阿提亚共同创立了长寿医学检测初创公司Biograph，该公司于一年前脱离隐匿模式。此人事变动可能引发市场对相关公司声誉及关联风险的关注。Biograph公司对此不予置评。

relations.label: 彼得·阿提亚 (Peter Attia)
relations.desc: 长寿医学专家，Biograph联合创始人

relations.label: David Protein
relations.desc: 一家生物科技或营养品公司（具体业务需核实）

relations.label: Biograph
relations.desc: 长寿医学检测初创公司

relations.label: 杰弗里·爱泼斯坦 (Jeffrey Epstein)
relations.desc: 已定罪的性犯罪者，其人际网络常引发声誉风险

strategic: 与争议人物关联的关键人物离职，可能旨在为相关公司（David Protein, Biograph）切割声誉风险，以保护品牌和融资前景。
此事件凸显了生物科技和长寿领域初创公司对创始人背景及公众形象日益增长的敏感性，尤其是在寻求资本时。

investment.asset: 与Peter Attia强关联的未上市长寿科技公司估值
investment.thesis: 创始人声誉风险可能影响其关联公司的融资能力、合作伙伴关系及公众接受度，存在估值下调风险。

zh.title: 印度Varaha获2000万美元用于碳移除
zh.fullTitle: 印度Varaha获2000万美元融资，扩大全球南方碳移除规模
zh.summary: 印度气候科技初创公司Varaha获得了2000万美元的新融资，这是由WestBridge Capital领投的4500万美元B轮融资的一部分。资金将用于扩大其在全球南方国家的碳移除项目规模。该公司专注于基于自然的碳信用额开发。此融资反映了资本对新兴市场碳移除解决方案的兴趣增长。

relations.label: Varaha
relations.desc: 印度气候科技初创公司，专注于农业和土地使用的碳移除

relations.label: WestBridge Capital
relations.desc: 领投此轮融资的投资机构

relations.label: 碳移除 (Carbon Removal)
relations.desc: 从大气中捕获并储存二氧化碳的技术或方法

relations.label: 全球南方 (Global South)
relations.desc: 泛指发展中国家，拥有巨大的碳汇潜力和低成本实施优势

relations.label: 碳信用额
relations.desc: 可交易的证书，代表减少或移除一吨二氧化碳当量

strategic: 融资表明投资者看好基于自然的解决方案在成本敏感的新兴市场实现规模化的潜力，以应对全球碳抵消需求。
Varaha的扩张可能加速全球南方国家碳市场的形成和整合，为当地带来新的绿色收入流，并影响全球碳信用供应链。

investment.asset: 全球碳信用额期货或相关ETF (如KRBN)
investment.thesis: 来自新兴市场的高质量、基于自然的碳信用额供应增加，有助于丰富市场并可能提升整体市场流动性及可信度，长期利好碳市场发展。

zh.title: 明尼阿波利斯科技社区在困难时期保持团结
zh.fullTitle: 明尼阿波利斯科技社区在紧张困难时期搁置工作支持社区
zh.summary: 明尼阿波利斯的科技行业创始人和投资者向TechCrunch表示，他们已暂停大部分工作，以帮助当地社区度过一段“紧张和困难的时期”。这反映了科技企业在面对本地社会危机时的社区参与和责任感。此类行动可能短期内影响当地初创企业的运营和融资活动。

relations.label: 明尼阿波利斯科技社区
relations.desc: 美国明尼苏达州明尼阿波利斯市的科技创业与投资生态

relations.label: TechCrunch
relations.desc: 知名科技媒体

relations.label: 社区支持
relations.desc: 企业在社会危机中的响应行动，可能影响短期业务但提升长期声誉

relations.label: 运营暂停
relations.desc: 短期业务活动中断，可能影响项目进度和现金流

strategic: 事件展示了科技生态系统在区域社会稳定性面临挑战时的脆弱性，以及企业社会责任（CSR）从被动转向主动应对本地危机的趋势。
短期的工作暂停可能延缓该区域科技集群的发展速度，但加强社区纽带可能有助于长期吸引和留住人才，增强生态韧性。

investment.asset: 明尼阿波利斯地区头部VC基金或孵化器
investment.thesis: 社区凝聚力和责任感是长期创新生态健康的关键要素，当前困难时期的团结表现可能预示着该生态更强的韧性和长期吸引力。

en.title: Quek's Guocoland Malaysia Buyout
en.fullTitle: Billionaire Quek Offers to Buy Out Guocoland Malaysia Unit
en.summary: Billionaire Quek Leng Chan's Guocoland Ltd. has proposed to acquire all minority shares in its Malaysian property developer subsidiary. The stated rationale is to achieve greater operational flexibility and streamline the business. This move suggests a strategic consolidation within the Quek family's property holdings. It may lead to delisting of the Malaysian unit and a restructuring of its assets.

relations.label: Quek Leng Chan
relations.desc: Billionaire controlling shareholder of Guocoland

relations.label: Guocoland Ltd.
relations.desc: Singapore-listed property developer making the offer

relations.label: Malaysian Property Unit
relations.desc: Target of the minority buyout offer

relations.label: Operational Streamlining
relations.desc: Primary stated motive for the privatization

relations.label: Minority Shareholders
relations.desc: Group being bought out, affecting liquidity

strategic: This privatization is a classic move to gain full control and operational freedom, often preceding asset sales, restructuring, or a pivot in business strategy away from public market scrutiny.
The offer may signal a bearish internal view on the near-term prospects of the Malaysian property market, prompting a move to insulate and restructure the unit privately.

investment.thesis: The buyout of a minority-held subsidiary could simplify the corporate structure, improve earnings clarity, and allow for more efficient capital allocation by the parent company, potentially unlocking value.

en.title: China Services Activity Accelerates
en.fullTitle: China Services Gauge Expands at Faster Rate
en.summary: A private survey indicates China's services sector activity accelerated its expansion in May, breaking a four-month trend of slowing growth. This suggests some resilience and pockets of momentum within the economy. However, the report also notes underlying demand remains frail, indicating the recovery is uneven. The data provides a mixed signal amid broader concerns about China's economic trajectory.

relations.label: China Services Sector
relations.desc: Broad economic segment showing renewed growth

relations.label: Private Survey (Caixin)
relations.desc: Source of the economic data, often focuses on SMEs

relations.label: Frail Demand
relations.desc: Key underlying weakness noted in the report

relations.label: Economic Momentum
relations.desc: Positive signal from the acceleration

relations.label: SMEs (Small & Medium Enterprises)
relations.desc: Likely primary beneficiaries of the services pickup

strategic: The acceleration, while positive, is fragile and contradicts some official PMI data, highlighting the uneven and uncertain nature of China's post-pandemic economic rebalancing.
Policymakers may interpret this as a sign that targeted stimulus is working in some sectors, potentially reducing the impetus for broader, aggressive easing measures in the near term.

investment.thesis: If the services recovery gains sustainable momentum, consumer-facing companies could see improved earnings. However, the 'frail demand' caveat warrants caution, making broad ETFs preferable to single stocks.

en.title: Fuji Media Plunge on Buyback Plan
en.fullTitle: Fuji Media Shares Plunge as Buyback May See Activist Exit
en.summary: Fuji Media Holdings' stock fell sharply after announcing a large share buyback program. The decline is linked to the concurrent announcement that entities associated with activist investor Yoshiaki Murakami may sell their stake. The market interprets the buyback as a mechanism to facilitate the activist's exit, removing a catalyst for corporate change. This reflects investor disappointment over the potential end of pressure for governance or strategic reforms.

relations.label: Fuji Media Holdings Inc.
relations.desc: Japanese media firm announcing the buyback

relations.label: Yoshiaki Murakami
relations.desc: Activist investor whose affiliates may sell

relations.label: Share Buyback
relations.desc: Corporate action causing the stock price reaction

relations.label: Activist Exit
relations.desc: Key market concern driving the sell-off

relations.label: Corporate Governance
relations.desc: Underlying theme of the activist's involvement

strategic: The company is effectively paying a premium (via buyback) to remove shareholder activism, prioritizing management stability over potential disruptive value creation, which is often viewed negatively by the market.
This event highlights the complex dynamics of activist investing in Japan, where traditional management may still prefer negotiated settlements (like buybacks) over public confrontations.

investment.thesis: The removal of the activist catalyst, combined with the use of capital for buybacks instead of growth investments, could lead to a period of underperformance and diminished market interest in the stock.

en.title: Peter Attia Leaves David Protein
en.fullTitle: Epstein-linked Longevity Guru Peter Attia Leaves David Protein
en.summary: Peter Attia, a prominent figure in the longevity space, has departed from David Protein. Attia is also a co-founder of Biograph, a longevity medical testing startup that launched publicly a year ago. His departure from one venture while leading another is a notable personnel shift in the competitive longevity industry. The news is framed with reference to his past, tenuous link to Jeffrey Epstein.

relations.label: Peter Attia
relations.desc: Longevity expert and medical doctor

relations.label: David Protein
relations.desc: Company from which Attia departed

relations.label: Biograph
relations.desc: Longevity testing startup co-founded by Attia

relations.label: Longevity Industry
relations.desc: High-growth sector focused on healthspan extension

relations.label: Reputational Risk
relations.desc: Implied by the mention of Epstein association

strategic: Attia's focus appears to be consolidating around Biograph, suggesting he views the diagnostic/testing segment as a higher-priority opportunity within longevity than his previous role.
The mention of the Epstein link, however tenuous, serves as a reminder of the significant reputational and ESG sensitivities that can impact high-profile founders and their ventures in this field.

investment.thesis: Attia's focused move towards Biograph underscores the growing commercial and investor interest in the data-driven, diagnostic layer of the longevity market, which may see accelerated growth.

en.title: Varaha Raises $20M for Carbon Removal
en.fullTitle: India's Varaha Bags $20M to Scale Carbon Removal
en.summary: Indian climate tech startup Varaha has secured $20 million as part of a $45 million Series B funding round. The round is led by WestBridge Capital. The capital is intended to scale the company's carbon removal projects, specifically focusing on the Global South. This reflects strong investor appetite for nature-based and technological carbon removal solutions in emerging markets.

relations.label: Varaha
relations.desc: Indian carbon removal startup

relations.label: WestBridge Capital
relations.desc: Lead investor in the Series B round

relations.label: Carbon Removal
relations.desc: Core business of Varaha

relations.label: Global South
relations.desc: Primary geographical focus for project scaling

relations.label: Series B Funding
relations.desc: Growth-stage capital injection

strategic: The funding highlights the strategic importance of the Global South in the carbon credit market, offering potentially lower-cost, nature-based removal pathways and aligning with climate justice narratives.
This investment signals maturation in the carbon removal sector, moving from pure R&D to scaled deployment, with venture capital playing a key role in building the project pipeline.

investment.asset: Carbon Credit Futures / Climate Tech VC Funds
investment.thesis: Large funding rounds for companies like Varaha validate the scalability of the carbon removal market. Investing in the broader asset class (credits or funds) provides exposure to this growth while diversifying away from single-company risk.

en.title: Minneapolis Tech Community Holds Strong
en.fullTitle: Minneapolis Tech Holds Strong During Difficult Time
en.summary: The Minneapolis technology community is demonstrating resilience during a challenging period. Local founders and investors have reportedly paused significant portions of their commercial work to support their community. This indicates a prioritization of social cohesion and local welfare over immediate business growth. The situation reflects how external social pressures can impact the operational focus of a regional tech hub.

relations.label: Minneapolis Tech Community
relations.desc: Regional cluster of startups and investors

relations.label: Founders
relations.desc: Business leaders shifting focus to community aid

relations.label: Investors
relations.desc: Capital providers supporting the community shift

relations.label: Operational Pause
relations.desc: Temporary slowdown in core business activities

relations.label: Community Support
relations.desc: Primary activity replacing normal operations

strategic: This behavior, while socially responsible, introduces a temporary but tangible drag on innovation and deal-flow velocity within a specific regional ecosystem, potentially creating a short-term opportunity gap.
The response strengthens the social license and long-term brand equity of the Minneapolis tech scene, which could enhance talent attraction and retention once normal operations resume.

investment.thesis: The impact is highly localized to Minneapolis. A broad market index investment avoids exposure to temporary, region-specific disruptions while maintaining exposure to the overall sector's growth.

es.title: Quek compra unidad malasia
es.fullTitle: Quek ofrece comprar unidad de Guocoland en Malasia
es.summary: El multimillonario Quek Leng Chan, a través de Guocoland Ltd., ha hecho una oferta para recomprar las acciones de los accionistas minoritarios en su filial desarrolladora de propiedades en Malasia. El objetivo declarado es obtener una mayor flexibilidad para racionalizar las operaciones. Esta movida podría indicar una estrategia de consolidación o reestructuración dentro del grupo empresarial en el mercado malasio.

relations.label: Quek Leng Chan
relations.desc: Multimillonario y presidente de Hong Leong Group

relations.label: Guocoland Ltd.
relations.desc: Desarrollador inmobiliario con sede en Singapur

relations.label: Malasia
relations.desc: Mercado objetivo de la operación de compra

relations.label: Propiedad
relations.desc: Sector inmobiliario, foco de la transacción

relations.label: Reestructuración
relations.desc: Riesgo operativo y de gobierno corporativo

strategic: Posible consolidación de activos en el Sudeste Asiático para mejorar la eficiencia operativa.
La compra de minoritarios sugiere una visión a largo plazo y control total sobre la estrategia en Malasia.

investment.thesis: La operación podría simplificar la estructura corporativa y mejorar la rentabilidad futura de la unidad malasia, beneficiando a la casa matriz.

es.title: Servicios China se aceleran
es.fullTitle: Actividad de servicios de China se expande más rápido
es.summary: Un sondeo privado muestra que la actividad del sector servicios en China se aceleró tras cuatro meses de crecimiento más lento. Esto sugiere que algunos segmentos de la economía están recuperando impulso, a pesar de una demanda aún frágil y un comienzo de año volátil. Los datos apuntan a una posible resiliencia en el consumo interno, aunque persisten desafíos macroeconómicos.

relations.label: China
relations.desc: Segunda economía mundial, foco del dato

relations.label: Sector Servicios
relations.desc: Motor clave del crecimiento y empleo en China

relations.label: Demanda Frágil
relations.desc: Riesgo principal para la sostenibilidad de la recuperación

relations.label: Sondeo Privado
relations.desc: Fuente alternativa de datos económicos (Caixin PMI)

relations.label: Consumo Interno
relations.desc: Variable crítica para el reequilibrio económico

strategic: La recuperación en servicios podría aliviar presiones sobre el crecimiento y estabilizar expectativas de mercado.
La fragilidad de la demanda subraya la dependencia continua de medidas de estímulo gubernamental.

investment.asset: ETF relacionado con consumo chino (ej. MCHI, FXI)
investment.thesis: Una mejora sostenida en servicios, que representa más del 50% del PIB, es positiva para las empresas orientadas al consumo y podría impulsar los mercados.

es.title: Fuji Media cae por recompra
es.fullTitle: Acciones de Fuji Media se desploman por plan de recompra
es.summary: Las acciones de Fuji Media Holdings cayeron hasta un 12% tras anunciar un amplio plan de recompra de acciones y señalar que las entidades vinculadas al inversor activista Yoshiaki Murakami podrían vender su participación. El mercado interpreta que la salida del activista, conocido por presionar por cambios, elimina un catalizador para la revalorización. La recompra puede verse como un uso de capital para apaciguar en lugar de invertir en crecimiento.

relations.label: Fuji Media Holdings
relations.desc: Conglomerado mediático japonés en dificultades

relations.label: Yoshiaki Murakami
relations.desc: Conocido inversor activista japonés

relations.label: Recompra de Acciones
relations.desc: Estrategia corporativa que impacta el precio

relations.label: Inversión Activista
relations.desc: Presión para cambios que ahora se disipa

relations.label: Mercado Japonés
relations.desc: Contexto de gobierno corporativo y valoración

strategic: La posible salida de Murakami reduce la presión para reformas corporativas, vista negativamente por el mercado.
El plan de recompra sugiere que la dirección prioriza el soporte del precio a corto plazo sobre una estrategia de crecimiento orgánico.

investment.thesis: La pérdida del catalizador activista y el uso de efectivo para recompra (en lugar de inversión) podrían llevar a una devaluación continua.

es.title: Gurú Attia deja David Protein
es.fullTitle: Peter Attia, vinculado a Epstein, deja David Protein
es.summary: Peter Attia, un gurú de la longevidad cuya asociación con Jeffrey Epstein ha generado controversia, ha dejado la startup de proteínas David Protein. Attia también cofundó Biograph, una startup de pruebas médicas de longevidad que salió del 'stealth mode' hace un año. Su salida podría estar relacionada con el escrutinio público sobre sus vínculos pasados. Biograph se negó a comentar sobre la situación.

relations.label: Peter Attia
relations.desc: Médico y gurú de la longevidad, figura controvertida

relations.label: David Protein
relations.desc: Startup de proteínas y suplementos

relations.label: Biograph
relations.desc: Startup de pruebas médicas de longevidad cofundada por Attia

relations.label: Jeffrey Epstein
relations.desc: Fuente del riesgo reputacional asociado

relations.label: Longevidad
relations.desc: Sector de alto crecimiento y biotecnología

strategic: El riesgo reputacional asociado a figuras clave puede forzar cambios abruptos en startups emergentes, afectando su trayectoria.
El sector de la longevidad sigue atrayendo capital, pero la gobernanza y el escrutinio de los fundadores son cada vez más críticos.

investment.thesis: La continua asociación con figuras controvertidas representa un riesgo reputacional sistémico alto para las empresas vinculadas, pudiendo afectar financiación y asociaciones.

es.title: Varaha recauda $20M para carbono
es.fullTitle: Varaha recauda $20M para remoción de carbono
es.summary: La empresa india Varaha ha asegurado $20 millones de dólares como parte de una ronda Serie B de $45 millones, liderada por WestBridge Capital. Los fondos se destinarán a escalar sus tecnologías de remoción de carbono, con foco en el 'Global South' (países en desarrollo). Esto refleja el creciente interés de capital riesgo en soluciones climáticas basadas en la naturaleza y en mercados emergentes.

relations.label: Varaha
relations.desc: Startup india de remoción de carbono

relations.label: WestBridge Capital
relations.desc: Firma de capital riesgo liderando la ronda

relations.label: Remoción de Carbono
relations.desc: Tecnología climática y mercado de créditos de carbono

relations.label: Global South
relations.desc: Mercados emergentes, foco geográfico de la empresa

relations.label: Capital Riesgo Climático
relations.desc: Tendencia de inversión en soluciones climáticas

strategic: La inversión destaca la creciente importancia estratégica y comercial de las soluciones de carbono basadas en la naturaleza en los mercados emergentes.
India se posiciona como un hub clave para la innovación en tecnologías climáticas, atrayendo capital internacional.

investment.asset: Sector de Tecnología Climática y créditos de carbono
investment.thesis: El flujo continuo de capital hacia startups como Varaha valida el crecimiento del mercado de remoción de carbono, especialmente con enfoque en geografías de menor coste y alto impacto.

es.title: Tech Minneapolis se une en crisis
es.fullTitle: Comunidad tecnológica de Minneapolis se mantiene unida
es.summary: Fundadores e inversores de la industria tecnológica de Minneapolis han declarado que gran parte de su trabajo está en pausa para ayudar a su comunidad durante lo que describen como un 'tiempo tenso y difícil'. La noticia no especifica la crisis, pero sugiere una respuesta colectiva fuerte del ecosistema local. Esto podría impactar temporalmente la productividad y el ritmo de inversión en la región.

relations.label: Comunidad Tech Minneapolis
relations.desc: Ecosistema de startups e inversores local

relations.label: Fundadores
relations.desc: Emprendedores poniendo trabajo en pausa

relations.label: Inversores
relations.desc: Capital riesgo local involucrado en la respuesta

relations.label: Crisis Comunitaria
relations.desc: Factor externo que interrumpe la actividad económica

relations.label: Resiliencia del Ecosistema
relations.desc: Capacidad de recuperación a largo plazo

strategic: La cohesión social y la respuesta comunitaria pueden fortalecer la reputación y resiliencia a largo plazo del ecosistema tecnológico local.
Las interrupciones agudas en la actividad productiva pueden retrasar rondas de financiación y hitos de startups, con un impacto económico localizado.

investment.asset: Fondos de VC con exposición a Minneapolis (a largo plazo)
investment.thesis: La fuerte cohesión comunitaria y el capital social demostrado son indicadores positivos para la sostenibilidad y atractivo futuro del ecosistema, una vez pase la crisis inmediata.
